QuestData.Title: Pest Control
QuestData.Description: Ugh! One of those little snobold runts trashed our camp while we were busy with that last dragon. They've been plaguing us whenever we turn our backs... I've had enough!$B$BTo the south you'll find the snobolds hiding under the skirts of some of the local magnataur. Go slaughter them.$B$BIf the magnataur interfere on behalf of their slaves, kill them as well.
QuestData.LogDescription: Duane at the 7th Legion Front wants you to kill 10 Snowplain Snobolds and 3 Dragonblight Magnataur at the magnataur camps surrounding Wyrmrest.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you finish off those pests?
